contentrichtext.text: {{taxobox |status = DD |status_system = IUCN2.3 |regnum = [[Plant]]ae |unranked_divisio = [[Angiosperms]] |unranked_classis = [[Eudicots]] |unranked_ordo = [[Rosids]] |ordo = [[Malpighiales]] |familia = [[Salicaceae]] |genus = ''[[Xylosma]]'' |species = '''''X. glaberrimum''''' |binomial = ''Xylosma glaberrimum'' |binomial_authority = [[Hermann Otto Sleumer|Sleumer]] |}} '''''Xylosma glaberrimum''''' is a species of [[plant]] in the [[Salicaceae]] family. It is [[Endemism|endemic]] to [[Brazil]]. ==Sources== * Torres, R.B. 1998. [http://www.iucnredlist.org/search/details.php/37982/all ''Xylosma glaberrimum'']. [http://www.iucnredlist.org 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. ] Downloaded on 24 August 2007. [[Category:Xylosma|glaberrimum]] [[Category:Flora of Brazil]] [[Category:Data deficient plants]] {{Salicaceae-stub}}
